sentence.Network_en: Bought things, I went to push bike and found the key to throw in the store.
sentence.Network_cn: 妈妈让我去购物.买好东西, 我去推自行车,发现钥匙丢在了店里.

sentence.Network_en: I saw her push the boulder down on you.
sentence.Network_cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

sentence.Network_en: He struggled to hold the bike down on the banked corners.
sentence.Network_cn: 拐过斜弯时他竭力将自行车把稳。
